meanings.definition: To serve as a co-captain with another person.
meanings.sent1: She and her friend cocaptained the soccer team together.
meanings.sent2: The two students cocaptained the debate club successfully.
meanings.sent3: The siblings cocaptained the family game night, leading to a tiebreaker.
meanings.sent4: The duo cocaptained the project, steering it towards success.
meanings.sent5: They cocaptained the ship, navigating through rough waters.

meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his cocaptained badge from last year.
meanings.sent2: The cocaptained team won the championship in 2020.
meanings.sent3: The cocaptained group photo brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent4: The cocaptained duo's leadership was evident throughout the season.
meanings.sent5: The cocaptained partnership was a key factor in their success.
